sentence.Network_cn: 殖民者早期移民者或殖民者.

sentence.Network_en: Many of the old puritan colonist retain their factious temperament in the new world.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多清教徒殖民者在新大陆仍保持他们好争论的脾气.

sentence.Network_en: However, China's education and mediation leads the youth culture into a post - colonist situation.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是, 中国的教育与媒介文化使得中国青年的消费主义更具有后殖民的可能性.

means.word_mean: 殖民者,移住民,殖民地居民

entry.tran: 殖民地开拓者;早期殖民地居民
entry.def: Colonists are the people who start a colony or the people who are among the first to live in a particular colony.

example.ex: The apple was brought over here by the colonists when they came.
example.tran: 苹果是早期殖民地开拓者来的时候带过来的。
早期的美洲殖民地开拓者

means.word_mean: 1. a person who settles in a new colony or moves into new country

means.word_mean: 殖民地开拓者,移民;殖民地居民

sentences.en: Colonists from Europe populated many parts of the Americas.
sentences.cn: 欧洲的殖民者移居到了美洲的许多地方。

sentences.en: Some of the early colonists were cruel to the native population.
sentences.cn: 有些早期移居殖民地的人对当地居民很残忍。
